title: Dow Leader In Buy Area; AI Giant At Key Crossroads
text:
BREAKING: Core PCE Inflation In Line With Views     Among the best stocks to buy and watch, Dow Jones heavy-machinery giant Caterpillar (CAT), IBD Leaderboard stock Nvidia (NVDA), IBD SwingTrader stock Cboe Exchange (CBOE) and sports betting leader DraftKings (DKNG) are at bullish chart levels on the stock market today.
